name: @elliots/typical
description: Runtime safe TypeScript transformer using typia
author: Elliot Shepherd <elliot@jarofworms.com>

scripts.build: pnpm run build:go:all && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.test: rm -f test/test.temp.ts && rm -rf test/project-fixtures && tsc && node --import ./dist/src/esm-loader-register.js --test dist/test/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage:html: rm -f test/test.temp.ts && tsc && c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text --include='dist/src/**' node --import ./dist/src/esm-loader-register.js --test dist/test/*.test.js
scripts.bench: pnpm run build && cd bench && pnpm install && npm run bench
scripts.sample:esm: cd samples/esm && pnpm install && npm run start
scripts.sample:ttsx: cd samples/ttsx && pnpm install && npm run start
scripts.sample:tsc: cd samples/tsc && pnpm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.sample:ttsc: cd samples/ttsc && pnpm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.sample:vite-react: cd samples/vite-react && pnpm install && pnpm run test
scripts.sample:bun: cd samples/bun && pnpm install && bun run start
scripts.samples: npm run sample:esm && npm run sample:ttsx && npm run sample:vite-react && npm run sample:bun
scripts.publish:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check && node scripts/publish.js
